name: Penitence
desc: Forces an enemy unit to move slower and take more damage from attacks and spells.

name: Purifying Flames
desc: Burns away impurities, dealing heavy magic damage to the target before causing them to regenerate health over time. The amount of health regenerated over its duration exceeds the amount of initial damage. Can be cast on enemies and allies.\n\nUpgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.

name: Splinter Blast
desc: Launches a ball of brittle ice toward an enemy. The ice shatters on impact, leaving the primary target completely unaffected, while hurling damaging splinters into nearby enemies in a 500 radius. Enemies struck by these splinters are slowed by 30%.

name: Poison Sting
desc: Adds poison damage to Venomancer's normal attacks, slowing movement speed.

name: Death Pact
desc: Clinkz consumes the target friendly or enemy creep, gaining a percent of its hitpoints as max health and damage.

name: Firefly
desc: Batrider takes to the skies, laying down a trail of flames from the air.  The fire damages any enemies it touches, and destroys trees below Batrider. While flying, Batrider gains unobstructed movement and vision.

name: Acid Spray
desc: Sprays high-pressure acid across a target area. Enemy units who step across the contaminated terrain take damage per second and have their armor reduced.

name: Overgrowth
desc: Summons an overgrowth of vines and branches around Treant that prevent afflicted enemies from moving, blinking, going invisible, or attacking.

name: Blood Rite
desc: Bloodseeker baptizes an area in sacred blood. After 3 seconds the ritual completes, causing any enemies caught in the area to take damage and become silenced.

name: Ghostship
desc: Summons a ghostly ship that sails through the battle before smashing apart, damaging and stunning all enemies caught near the wreckage. Allied heroes touched by the Ghostship are given a swig of The Admiral's Rum, receiving bonus movement speed and a delayed reaction to incoming damage.\n\nUpgradeable by Aghanim's Scepter.
